product_name: The North Face TKA 80 Full-Zip Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Bundle up for protection on cold-weather runs, without sacrificing your mobility, in the lightweight microfleece TKA 80 Full-Zip Top from The North Face. Body-mapped stretch mesh panels down the sides and back accelerate the movement of moisture to keep you dry and warm. Reflective trim throughout keeps you visible while running on the trails or the road after dusk. Stash energy gels or car keys in the zippered pocket on upper left arm. Closeout.
short_description: Bundle up for protection on cold-weather runs, without sacrificing your mobility, in the lightweight microfleece TKA 80 Full-Zip Top from The North Face.
